title: Why is the speed limit of Wrightsville Ave. between Military Cut Off and French Rd 45 MPH, but the majority of the road is 35 MPH? 45 MPH is too fast, especially considering the sharp turn at Rogersville Rd. There seem to be an accident at Hooker Rd and Wrighstville far too often.
text:
